about_the_game:
Our cities are under attack! Tons of meteories are coming from the space to destroy us! Luckly, you are here to help! Your sophisticated weapon will make them disappear!

Oh no... You can only hunt one kind of meteorite with specific shape, color and rotation...

No worries! Create bubbles in the sky to transform all meteorites into the pattern given by the weapon and hunt them! Change their shape, color and rotation and save the city!




The Basic Mechanics are shown in the picture below.



Meteorites will come from the sky to destroy the city. Your goal is to create bubbles to transform them into the pattern given by your weapon.

There are 3 types of bubbles:

  • Pink Bubbles: They will change the shape of the meteorites (square, circle, triangle).
  • Green Bubbles: They will change the colour of the meteorites (green, pink, blue).
  • Blue Bubbles: They will change the rotation of the meteorites.

And remember! The bigger the bubble is, the more transformations the meteorite will suffer!


CAMPAIGN


  • You have been chosen to protect all our cities from meteorites! There are 10 levels per city (waves). Will each city survive the attack? It depends on you!
  • Each city will bring new mechanisms!
  • The number of cities available will depend on the version you have. See "Versions" section for more detailed information.
  • If you get 3 stars in any of the 3 categories (life, bubbles, time) or globally, you will unblock new challenges.
  • If you get 3 stars globally, you will unblock new features on Survival Mode.
  • Steam Achievements if you manage to success and get 3 stars!
  • Online Leaderboard: Compite with other players and be part of the Hall Of Fame!

CHALLENGES


  • Different types of challenges: Life, Bubbles, Time or combination of all of them.
  • Per challenge, you will have limited Life, number of Bubbles and Time to survive!
  • The challenges will be linked to the campaign mode and the city (and mechanics) learnt!
  • Steam Achievements if you manage to success and get 3 stars!
  • Online Leaderboard: Compite with other players and be part of the Hall Of Fame!

SURVIVAL


  • Survive as many levels as possible and get the highest score among other players.
  • The maximum score and difficulty available will be based on what you did in the Campaign: the better you play in the Campaign, the more score you will be able to get on Survival Mode.
  • Online Leaderboard: Compite with other players and be part of the Hall Of Fame!




Hunteroids will be delivered in tree releases:

DEMO

The Demo will have the following features and will be delivered before October, 2022:

  • 1 city to save (5 levels instead of 10) of the Campaign Mode, which will explain the basic mechanics. Difficulty will gradually increase.
  • Different Challenges (life/bubbles/life) that will be unblocked based on what you do in the Campaign Mode.
  • Gamepad Support.

EARLY ACCESS


The Early Access will contain:

  • Up to 5 cities of 10 levels each (50 levels). Each city following different mechanics.
  • Survival Mode including the mechanics of the 5 cities.
  • 4 new Challenges per City (+20 new levels).

FULL VERSION


This version will include up to 10 cities (100 levels) of the Campaign Mode and other features. The final version will depend on the roadmap defined during Early Access period. Candidates are explained below.


CURRENT STATUS


The current status of the game is as follows:

  • First City of the Campaign mode completed with basic mechanics
  • Survival Mode completed with Steam leaderboard integrated
  • Demo and Early Access under development: New cities, UI & Art review, ...

FULL VERSION ROADMAP


The following features are nice candidates for the Full Version. However, this might change based on Early Access evolution and discussions with the community:

  • 10 cities (100 levels) in the Campaign Mode. Each city with different mechanics
  • Local Multiplayer support
  • Steam Achievements
  • Steam in the Cloud
  • Statistics
  • Gamepad Support
  • Difficulty Levels
  • ...
